forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun this morning with increasing clouds this afternoon. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 56F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High around 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later at night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 44F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
